title: The Lover
description: Serena’s life hasn’t been easy...And lately, mourning is all she can find herself doing.As the memories continue to drift through her mind in the cabin from her past, she must face one fact:Devon is dead.His ghost is the only thing left to haunt her and a constant reminder of the tragic fate that sealed them those several months ago.With all this tragedy, Serena has to wonder what there is on the horizon.
author: Megan J. Parker
